clauses.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
clauses.description: Location-based information is collected and may be used and/or shared with third parties for purposes not directly related to the services provided (i.e. the Service doesn't rely on the use or share of location data to function properly).
clauses.clause_text:
deze content kan al dan niet zijn geïdentificeerd als inhoud met expliciete taal of andere eigenschappen.
Niettemin gaat u ermee akkoord om de Dienst op e

case.text: This service may collect, use, and share location data

clauses.title: The service collects many different types of personal data
clauses.description: The service collects different kinds of personal data, such as name, demographic information, postal address, biometric data, device information, IDs, contacts, call logs...
clauses.clause_text:
Full quote: "What Personal Information About Customers Does Amazon Collect?

We collect your personal information in order to provide and continually improve our products and services.

Here are the types of personal information we collect: Information You Give Us: We receive and store any information you provide in relation to Amazon Services. Click here to see examples of what we collect. You can choose not to provide certain information, but then you might not be able to take advantage of many of our Amazon Services. Automatic Information: We automatically collect and store certain types of information about your use of Amazon Services, including information about your interaction with content and services available through Amazon Services. Like many websites, we use "cookies" and other unique identifiers, and we obtain certain types of information when your web browser or device accesses Amazon Services and other content served by or on behalf of Amazon on other websites. Click here to see examples of what we collect. Information from Other Sources: We might receive information about you from other sources, such as updated delivery and address information from our carriers, which we use to correct our records and deliver your next purchase more easily. Click here to see additional examples of the information we receive."

case.text: Many different types of personal data are collected

clauses.title: This service can share your personal information to third parties
clauses.description: Your personal data is or may be given to third parties nonessential to the service’s operation. This could be a business partner that receives your data to provide targeted advertisements.
clauses.clause_text: You can tell when a third party is involved in your transactions, and we share customers' personal information related to those transactions with that third party.

case.text: This service shares your personal data with third parties that are not essential to its operation

clauses.title: Tracking via third-party cookies for other purposes without your consent.
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.
clauses.clause_text:
We provide ad companies with information that allows them to serve you with more useful and relevant Amazon ads and to measure their effectiveness.
We never share your name or other information that directly identifies you when we do this.
Instead, we use an advertising identifier like a cookie or other device identifier.

case.text: Third-party cookies are used for advertising

clauses.title: The service may use tracking pixels, web beacons, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting on users.
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.
clauses.clause_text: As is common in the advertising industry, we use cookies, pixels, and other technologies (collectively, "cookies")

case.text: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting

clauses.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: Third-Party Service Providers: We employ other companies and individuals to perform functions on our behalf. Examples include fulfilling orders for products or services, delivering packages, sending postal mail and email, removing repetitive information from customer lists, analyzing data, providing marketing assistance, providing search results and links (including paid listings and links), processing payments, transmitting content, scoring, assessing and managing credit risk, and providing customer service.

case.text: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: The service can sell or otherwise transfer your personal data as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction.
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.
clauses.clause_text:
Also, in the unlikely event that Amazon.com, Inc.
or substantially all of its assets are acquired, customer information will of course be one of the transferred assets.

case.text: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction

clauses.title: Your profile is combined across various products
clauses.description: When using multiple services from one same company, they can combine these (unrelated) information sources about you to build up a single richer user profile about you.
clauses.clause_text: According to the excerpt, usage/activities from different apps will affect targeted advertising towards you. Your activities and overall profile are combined across the different products you may or may not own.

case.text: Your profile is combined across various products

clauses.title: This service reserves the right to disclose your personal information without notifying you
clauses.description: If the Government governing the Terms requests personal data of a user of this service, they may not inform/notify the user while complying with the request.
clauses.clause_text:
We release account and other personal information when we believe release is appropriate to comply with the law.
enforce or apply our Conditions of Use and other agreements.
or protect the rights, property, or safety of Amazon, our users, or others.

case.text: Your personal data may be disclosed to comply with government requests without notice to you

clauses.title: This service may use your personal information for marketing purposes
clauses.description: The service may use your personal data for marketing, such as sending you personalised offerings.
clauses.clause_text: We use your personal information to recommend features, products, and services that might be of interest to you, identify your preferences, and personalize your experience with Amazon Services.

case.text: Your personal data may be used for marketing purposes

clauses.title: Voice data is collected and shared with third-parties
clauses.description: The service collects data and recordings of your voice when you communicate with a service verbally and may use and share them with third parties, that may use this data for marketing or advertising.
clauses.clause_text: When you use our voice, image and camera services, we use your voice input, images, videos, and other personal information to respond to your requests, provide the requested service to you, and improve our services.

case.text: Voice data is collected and shared with third-parties

clauses.title: This service gathers information about you through third parties
clauses.description: This Service may employ, either identifiable or non-identifiable, data collection from third party sources about you.
clauses.clause_text: Some third-parties may provide us pseudonymized information about you (such as demographic information or sites where you have been shown ads) from offline and online sources that we may use to provide you more relevant and useful advertising

case.text: Information is gathered about you through third parties

clauses.title: This service tracks which web page referred you to it
clauses.description: The service logs the URL of the last web page you visited before visiting the Site and may use that information to gather more data about you.
clauses.clause_text: the full Uniform Resource Locator (URL) clickstream to, through, and from our websites, including date and time.

case.text: This service tracks which web page referred you to it

clauses.title: The service uses your personal data to employ targeted third-party advertising
clauses.description: Your Personal Information is traded and shared with advertising companies to target ads on you, either on the website you were visiting or in third party websites. Your interaction with the service and data you have shared with them may be gathered to create an advertising ID or profile.
clauses.clause_text: We work with third parties, such as advertisers, publishers, social media networks, search engines, ad serving companies, and advertising companies working on their behalf, to improve the relevance of ads we serve.

case.text: Your personal data is used to employ targeted third-party advertising

clauses.title: Your biometric data is collected
clauses.description: This service can collect or use your biometric data. This includes but is not limited to facial recognition, fingerprints, and iris scans. Although this feature can sometimes be convenient to the user, providing this type of information to the service could open your personal data to being sold or stolen.
clauses.clause_text: voice recordings when you speak to Alexa.

case.text: Your biometric data is collected

clauses.title: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user
clauses.clause_text: (i) zal in geen geval de totale aansprakelijkheid van ons of onze softwarelicentiegevers jegens u voor alle schade die voortvloeit uit of verband houdt met uw gebruik of onvermogen om de Software te gebruiken hoger zijn dan het bedrag van vijftig dollar ($ 50,00).

case.text: Any liability on behalf of the service is only limited to the fees you paid as a user

clauses.title: You can request access and deletion of personal data
clauses.description: Users have the right to access personal data hold by the Service, correct it and/or permanently delete it. This usually applies to Services GDPR compliants.
clauses.clause_text: In addition, to the extent required by applicable law, you may have the right to request access to or delete your personal data. If you wish to do any of these things, please contact Customer Service. Depending on your data choices, certain services may be limited or unavailable.

case.text: You can request access, correction and/or deletion of your data

clauses.title: The service allows you to opt out of providing personal information to third parties
clauses.description: The Service provides opt-out instructions to the share of (some) personal information with third parties.
clauses.clause_text: Other than as set out above, you will receive notice when personal information about you might be shared with third parties, and you will have an opportunity to choose not to share the information.

case.text: You can opt out of providing personal information to third parties

clauses.title: This service provides archives of their terms of service so that changes can be viewed over time
clauses.description: This case applies to Services whose agreements provide previous versions, so that users can compare them and understand how the Service seems to evolve regarding user rights.
clauses.clause_text: Last updated: January 1, 2020. To see prior version, click here.

case.text: Archives of their agreements are provided so that changes can be viewed over time

clauses.title: The service provides details about what kinds of personal information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text:
What Personal Information About Customers Does Amazon Collect?

We collect your personal information in order to provide and continually improve our products and services.

Here are the types of personal information we collect:

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis
clauses.description: Users know the date the privacy policy was last updated and can thus infer the next time it will be reviewed. This gives users more certainty about how long they can trust the current policy to apply.
clauses.clause_text:
Our business changes constantly, and our Privacy Notice will change also.
You should check our websites frequently to see recent changes.

case.text: The service reviews its privacy policy on a regular basis

clauses.title: The service provides information about how they intend to use your personal data
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy explains the purposes for which data is collected and the way it is processed, used and shared.
clauses.clause_text:
For What Purposes Does Amazon Use Your Personal Information?

We use your personal information to operate, provide, develop, and improve the products and services that we offer our customers. These purposes include:

case.text: Information is provided about how your personal data is used

clauses.title: The service provides a complaint mechanism for the handling of personal data
clauses.description: The service provides users with contact information for an internal or external structure to lodge complaints. It also provides users with contact information for a higher data protection / privacy office in case the internal mechanism fails to satisfy the user.
clauses.clause_text: If you have any concern about privacy at Amazon, please contact us with a thorough description, and we will try to resolve it.

case.text: A complaint mechanism is provided for the handling of personal data

clauses.title: Users are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service
clauses.clause_text:
Als u annuleert binnen 3 werkdagen na aanmelding voor of omzetting van een gratis proefperiode in een betaald lidmaatschap (of, voor klanten in de Europese Unie, binnen 14 dagen na ontvangst van de bevestiging van uw abonnement of lidmaatschapsdienst), zullen wij uw volledige lidmaatschapskosten restitueren.
behalve dat we kosten in rekening kunnen brengen (of deze op uw restitutie inhouden) voor de waarde van de Dienst die via uw account wordt gebruikt gedurende die periode.
U accepteert ook uitdrukkelijk dat de Dienst zal starten binnen uw annuleringstermijn.
Als u op een ander moment annuleert, betalen we uw volledige lidmaatschapskosten alleen terug als geen toegang is verkregen tot Digitale Content die beschikbaar is gesteld als onderdeel van uw alleen-video-lidmaatschap via uw account sinds uw laatste verschuldigde lidmaatschapskosten.

case.text: You are entitled to a refund if certain thresholds or standards are not met by the service

clauses.title: The user is informed about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
How Secure Is Information About Me?

We design our systems with your security and privacy in mind.

  • We work to protect the security of your personal information during transmission by using encryption protocols and software.
  • We follow the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI DSS) when handling credit card data.
  • We maintain physical, electronic, and procedural safeguards in connection with the collection, storage, and disclosure of personal customer information. Our security procedures mean that we may occasionally request proof of identity before we disclose personal information to you.
  • Our devices offer security features to protect them against unauthorized access and loss of data.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You can opt out of promotional communications
clauses.description: You can update your account preferences and/or easily unsubscribe of email/sms lists to stop receiving promotional communications.
clauses.clause_text:
If you do not want to receive email or other communications from us, please adjust your Customer Communication Preferences.
If you don't want to receive in-app notifications from us, please adjust your notification settings in the app or device.

case.text: You can opt out of promotional communications

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.
clauses.clause_text:
Because cookies and identifiers allow you to take advantage of some essential features of Amazon Services, we recommend that you leave them turned on.
For instance, if you block or otherwise reject our cookies, you will not be able to add items to your Shopping Cart, proceed to Checkout, or use any Services that require you to Sign in.
For more information about cookies and other identifiers, see our Cookies Notice.

case.text: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service

clauses.title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
clauses.description: You card will be billed on recurring basis unless cancelled. For instance, monthly or annual subscriptions.
clauses.clause_text: Video-abonnementen van derden worden automatisch verlengd, tenzij u het abonnement opzegt of indien dit verloopt, of u uw Amazon Prime of Prime Video-lidmaatschap opzegt of indien dit verloopt.

case.text: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

clauses.title: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service
clauses.clause_text: If you upload files such as images, videos or others, the Service collects and may access that information.

case.text: Your private content may be accessed by people working for the service

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: If you are under 18, you may use Amazon Services only with the involvement of a parent or guardian.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: Users agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: (v) de Dienst of Digitale Content niet gebruiken voor commerciële of illegale doeleinden.

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: This service requires first-party cookies
clauses.description: First-party cookies only belong to the domain of the service and not a third party.
clauses.clause_text: Like many websites, we use "cookies" and other unique identifiers

case.text: First-party cookies are used

clauses.title: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder
clauses.description: Should any portion of the Terms of Service be unenforceable or invalid, that portion will be enforced to the fullest extent permitted by applicable law and the remainder of the TOS will remain valid and enforceable.
clauses.clause_text: Als een voorwaarde of bepaling van deze Overeenkomst ongeldig, nietig of om welke reden dan ook niet-afdwingbaar wordt geacht, zal dat deel scheidbaar worden geacht en zal het geen invloed hebben op de geldigheid en afdwingbaarheid van een resterende voorwaarde of bepaling.

case.text: Invalidity of any portion of the Terms of Service does not entail invalidity of its remainder

clauses.title: Third parties may be involved in operating the service
clauses.clause_text: We make available to you services, products, applications, or skills provided by third parties for use on or through Amazon Services.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service

clauses.title: This service collects your IP address for location use
clauses.clause_text:
your location information.
  • your IP address.

case.text: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
